title: Ep 2569 - A New Scheme
shortDesc: Jethalal brings home the Bengali dish that Babita Ji made for him but on the way he meets Goli who follows him home and eats the entire dish alone.

title: Ep 2570 - A New Plan
shortDesc: After Bagha and Nattu Kaka see Jethalal tensed due to the declining sales at Gada Electronics, they come up with a plan to attract more customers by offering them free unlimited Pani Puri with every purchase.

title: Ep 2571- The Unusual Offer
shortDesc: Jethalal is initially skeptical of Baga and Nattu Kaka's plan but eventually gives a go ahead. Posters of the unusual pani puri offer are put up across the city and people come to know about it.

title: Ep 2572 - Profits Soar
shortDesc: As customers arrive at Gada electronics and opt for a mobile recharge instead of purchasing any product, Jethalal contemplates the success of the pani puri offer. Baga and Nattu Kaka assure Jethalal that the offer will prove a success.

title: Ep 2573 - An Obstacle
shortDesc: The free Pani Puri scheme seems to be working for Gada Electronics as the sales are spiked as people rush to the store after hearing about the scheme.

title: Ep 2574 - Pani Puri Conundrum
shortDesc: Everything seemed going well for Jethalal after the free Pani Puri scheme leads to an immense increase in sales until Gupta Ji leaves his shop and runs away due to some emergency.

title: Ep 2575 - Selling Pani Puri
shortDesc: To get Jethalal out of the situation that he's in, Mehta suggests him to call Bawri Ji and asks her for help but when Bawri Ji also refuses to do the deed, Jethalal covers his face and starts selling the pani puris himself.

title: Ep 2576 - Iyer Confronts Jethalal
shortDesc: As Jethalal is selling the pani puris, Iyer and Babita Ji pass by the shop in a car. Iyer tells Babita that he saw Jethalal selling pani puris so they decide to visit the shop and find out the truth.

title: Ep 2577 - Under Arrest
shortDesc: As Jethalal is smoothly handling Gupta Ji's Pani Puri stall, some people from the Municipal Corporation come and take him to the police station and take Jethalal and other vendors with them

title: Ep 2578 - Confined
shortDesc: Jethalal gets into a big trouble when police arrest him for selling Pani Puri at Gupta Ji's stall without any license. Bagha and Nattu Kaka go to the police station to get him out but fail and later Champaklal, Popatlal, and Bhide also reach there.

title: Ep 2579 - The Explanation
shortDesc: Jethalal is in police custody and everyone from Gokuldham society try to get him out. Inspector Chalu Panday files a case against him for selling eatables on the street without a license.

title: Ep 2580 - Finding The Orchestra
shortDesc: Everything was going right in the Gokuldham society after Jethalal comes out of the lock-up but another problem arrives when the orchestra that Bhide booked for the Navratri Garba Nights cancels.

title: Ep 2581  - Garba Nights Cancelled?
shortDesc: Everyone is worried in the Gokuldham Society as the orchestra that was supposed to play in the Garba Nights cancels. So Jethalal comes to the rescue and promises everyone that he'll find the orchestra

title: Ep 2582 - The Struggle Is Real
shortDesc: Jethalal is struggling really hard as he is still not able to find the orchestra for the Garba nights so he decides to take Mehta's help. Things get even more serious when even Mehta is not able to help him either.

title: Ep 2583 - Jethalal Ran Away?
shortDesc: Everyone gets dressed for the Garba Night celebration and comes to the society compound. Jethalal tells everyone that the orchestra is on its way and they should start the Pooja first.
